title: #1 Boss
description:
'We play by my rules now.' 
- Kit, the new boss.
 
'We play by my rules now.'
- Kit, the new bossWho does Kit Walker think he is? The trust fund heir waltzes in and wants to boss me around, but if I catch him misbehaving, his father will yank his inheritance. Stalemate, right? Not when our chemistry is irresistible! Ironically, we run the top dating app on the market. Could this be my 'perfect match'...or the perfect scandal?- Alexandra, the one in charge
author: Katy Evans
